attributes.action: Pay no heed to petitions demanding that citizens are armed!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In response to the awful recent incidents of guncrime, petitions have appeared here calling for all citizens to be allowed to carry firearms, or in even more moronic and sinister petitions, "other tools" of self-defence.

Whilst there is not room here to list the myriad reasons why arming the general public is utterly ludicrous, I think it is appropriate to have a petition to demonstrate the strength of feeling against such a suggestion.

Everybody deplores the violence that guns cause.  Everyone wants safer streets.  However, if you seriously think that arming the general public is going to achieve that, then get a brain, frankly. 

Have any of those petitioners gone further than thinking "I'll feel safer"?  It takes a hell of a lot training to have police marksmen physically and psychologically properly equipped to deal with armed situations - and they can make mistakes. 

People have prejudices, issues and different boundaries.  And you want to arm them?
